participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, loves to explore and express herself through songs and stories.
participant_1.background: I like to eat chocolate candy. I like to look at blocks and sing about letters. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. I am four years old.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Resilient and dedicated, balancing his career and fatherhood while navigating life's challenges.
participant_2.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.
